director.name: Camila José Donoso Camila José Donoso

this_title: Nona. Si me mojan, yo los quemo
trans_title: 诺娜，如果他们骚扰我，我就烧了他们
Nona. If You Soak Me, I Will Burn You
introduction: 入选2018年全州计划。The story about 66 years old Nona, who self-exiled herself in a small coastal town in Chile called ‘Pichilemu’ after taking revenge on her lover
chinese_title: 诺娜，如果他们骚扰我，我就烧了他们
foreign_title: Nona. Si me mojan, yo los quemo
